ecological_assessment.qualitative_description: The model captures most NPZ model characteristics, but with some notable deviations from the exact mathematical structure specified

nutrient_equation_uptake.explanation: Partial match. Uses Michaelis-Menten kinetics (N/(K_N+N)), but lacks the self-shading term (a/(b+c*P))

nutrient_equation_recycling.explanation: Partial match. Includes nutrient recycling through mortality and grazing, but not with the exact specified functional form (beta*lambda*P^2/(mu^2+P^2)*Z)

nutrient_equation_mixing.explanation: Missing the environmental mixing term k*(N0-N)

phytoplankton_equation_growth.explanation: Partial match. Uses nutrient-limited growth (N/(K_N+N)), but lacks the full self-shading term

phytoplankton_equation_loss.explanation: Partial match. Includes mortality and predation terms, but not with the exact specified functional forms

zooplankton_equation.explanation: Close match. Captures zooplankton growth through predation and mortality, with assimilation efficiency
